  1. echo 'abc-123-xyz' | sed 's/\(.*\)-\(.*\)-\(.*\)/\3-\1-\2/'
  2. echo '2024-05-28' | sed 's/\(....\)-\(..\)-\(..\)/\2-\3-\1/'

Notes En:
Multiple groups enable complex text transformations.

Notes Lt:
Kuo daugiau grupių, tuo sudėtingesnius transformavimus galima atlikti.

Usage:
sed 's/\(group1\)-\(group2\)-\(group3\)/\3-\1-\2/'

title: Command: sed 's/\s\+/ /g'
text:
Command: sed 's/\s\+/ /g'
Category: regular_expressions

Description En:
Replaces all whitespace sequences (spaces or tabs) with a single space.

Description Lt:
Pakeičia visus tarpų ar tabų pasikartojimus vienu tarpu.

Examples:
  1. echo "today\tis\twarm" | sed 's/\s\+/ /g'

Notes En:
\s matches spaces and tabs in many regex engines.

Notes Lt:
Naudojamas regex simbolis \s, reiškiantis tarpą ar tabą.

Usage:
sed 's/\s\+/ /g' file

title: Command: grep -E 'oo?o'
text:
Command: grep -E 'oo?o'
Category: regular_expressions

Description En:
The question mark makes the previous character optional.

Description Lt:
Klaustukas reiškia, kad simbolis prieš jį yra pasirenkamas.

Examples:
  1. grep -E 'oo?o' list2
  2. sed 's/oo?o/A/' list2

Notes En:
oo?o matches both 'ooo' and 'ooo' with optional middle character.

Notes Lt:
Oo?o atitinka 'ooo' ir 'oo o'.

Usage:
grep -E 'oo?o' file

title: Command: grep -E 'o{3}'
text:
Command: grep -E 'o{3}'
Category: regular_expressions

Description En:
Searches for a character repeated exactly n times.

Description Lt:
Ieško simbolio, kuris pasikartoja tiksliai n kartų.

Examples:
  1. grep -E 'o{3}' list2
  2. sed 's/o{3}/A/' list2

Notes En:
o{3} means exactly three occurrences of 'o'.

Notes Lt:
Pavyzdyje ieškoma tiksliai trijų 'o'.

Usage:
grep -E 'o{3}' file

title: Command: grep -E 'o{2,3}'
text:
Command: grep -E 'o{2,3}'
Category: regular_expressions

Description En:
Looks for a character repeated between n and m times.

Description Lt:
Ieško simbolio, pasikartojančio nuo n iki m kartų.

Examples:
  1. grep -E 'o{2,3}' list2
  2. sed 's/o{2,3}/A/' list2

Notes En:
{2,3} means between two and three occurrences.

Notes Lt:
{2,3} reiškia nuo dviejų iki trijų 'o'.

Usage:
grep -E 'o{2,3}' file

title: Command: bash history expansion (!)
text:
Command: bash history expansion (!)
Category: bash_history

Description En:
Bash allows using ! for quick access to history commands.

Description Lt:
Bash leidžia naudoti ! simbolį istorijos komandų iškvietimui.

Examples:
  1. !!
  2. !ls
  3. !2002
  4. !?file
  5. !-2

Notes En:
History expansion allows calling previous commands by pattern or number.

Notes Lt:
Galima naudoti ! su istorijos numeriais arba šablonais.

Usage:
!<pattern>, !<number>, !!

title: Command: whoami
text:
Command: whoami
Category: users

Description En:
Displays the username of the current user.

Description Lt:
Parodo dabartinio vartotojo vardą.

Examples:
  1. whoami

Usage:
whoami

title: Command: who
text:
Command: who
Category: users

Description En:
Shows who is logged into the system.

Description Lt:
Parodo, kas yra prisijungę prie sistemos.

Examples:
  1. who

Usage:
who

title: Command: who am i
text:
Command: who am i
Category: users

Description En:
Displays information about the current terminal session.

Description Lt:
Parodo informaciją apie dabartinę terminalo sesiją.

Examples:
  1. who am i

Usage:
who am i

title: Command: w
text:
Command: w
Category: users

Description En:
Shows logged-in users and what they are doing.

Description Lt:
Parodo prisijungusius vartotojus ir jų veiklą.

Examples:
  1. w

Usage:
w

title: Command: id
text:
Command: id
Category: users

Description En:
Displays a user’s UID, GID and groups.

Description Lt:
Parodo vartotojo UID, GID ir grupes.

Examples:
  1. id
  2. id paul

Usage:
id [username]

title: Command: su username
text:
Command: su username
Category: users

Description En:
Switches to another user, asking for password.

Description Lt:
Perjungia į kitą vartotoją paprašant slaptažodžio.

Examples:
  1. su tania
  2. su laura

Usage:
su username

title: Command: su root
text:
Command: su root
Category: users

Description En:
Switches to the root user.

Description Lt:
Perjungia į root vartotoją.

Examples:
  1. su root

Usage:
su root

title: Command: su -
text:
Command: su -
Category: users

Description En:
Switches to root with full root environment.

Description Lt:
Perjungia į root su pilna root aplinka.

Examples:
  1. su -

Usage:
su -

title: Command: su - username
text:
Command: su - username
Category: users

Description En:
Switches to another user with full login environment.

Description Lt:
Perjungia į kitą vartotoją perkraunant jo login aplinką.

Examples:
  1. su - laura
  2. su - harry

Usage:
su - username

title: Command: su
text:
Command: su
Category: users

Description En:
Without arguments, switches to root.

Description Lt:
Be parametro – perjungia į root vartotoją.

Examples:
  1. su

Usage:
su

title: Command: sudo -u username command
text:
Command: sudo -u username command
Category: users

Description En:
Executes a command as another user.

Description Lt:
Vykdo komandą kaip kitas vartotojas.

Examples:
  1. sudo -u valentina /usr/sbin/useradd
  2. sudo -u root useradd harry

Usage:
sudo -u username command

title: Command: visudo
text:
Command: visudo
Category: users

Description En:
Safely edits the sudoers configuration file.

Description Lt:
Atidaro sudoers failą saugiam redagavimui.

Examples:
  1. visudo

Usage:
visudo

title: Command: sudo su
text:
Command: sudo su
Category: users

Description En:
Gives a root shell using sudo permissions.

Description Lt:
Suteikia root shell naudojant sudo teises.

Examples:
  1. sudo su

Usage:
sudo su

title: Command: grep sudo /var/log/auth.log
text:
Command: grep sudo /var/log/auth.log
Category: users

Description En:
Displays sudo log entries from system logs.

Description Lt:
Parodo sudo įrašus iš žurnalo failų.

Examples:
  1. grep sudo /var/log/auth.log
  2. tail /var/log/secure | grep sudo

Usage:
grep sudo /var/log/auth.log

title: Command: useradd
text:
Command: useradd
Category: user management

Description En:
Creates a new user on the system.

Description Lt:
Sukuria naują vartotoją sistemoje.

Examples:
  1. useradd yannina
  2. useradd -m -d /home/yannina -c "Yannina Wickmayer" yannina

Usage:
useradd [parinktys] username

title: Command: cat /etc/passwd
text:
Command: cat /etc/passwd
Category: user management

Description En:
Displays system user entries from /etc/passwd.

Description Lt:
Parodo sistemos vartotojų įrašus iš /etc/passwd failo.

Examples:
  1. cat /etc/passwd

Usage:
cat /etc/passwd

title: Command: head -n 1 /etc/passwd
text:
Command: head -n 1 /etc/passwd
Category: user management

Description En:
Shows the first entry of /etc/passwd – the root user.

Description Lt:
Parodo pirmą /etc/passwd įrašą – root vartotoją.

Examples:
  1. head -n 1 /etc/passwd

Usage:
head -n 1 /etc/passwd

title: Command: useradd -D
text:
Command: useradd -D
Category: user management

Description En:
Displays default settings for useradd.

Description Lt:
Parodo numatytus useradd nustatymus.

Examples:
  1. useradd -D
  2. useradd -D | grep HOME

Usage:
useradd -D

title: Command: userdel
text:
Command: userdel
Category: user management

Description En:
Deletes a user from the system.

Description Lt:
Ištrina vartotoją iš sistemos.

Examples:
  1. userdel yannina
  2. userdel -r yannina

Notes En:
The -r option also deletes the user's home directory.

Notes Lt:
Parinktis -r ištrina ir vartotojo namų katalogą.

Usage:
userdel [parinktys] username

title: Command: usermod
text:
Command: usermod
Category: user management

Description En:
Modifies an existing user.

Description Lt:
Keičia esamo vartotojo nustatymus.

Examples:
  1. usermod -c "Coach Harry" harry
  2. usermod -d /home/newhome harry

Usage:
usermod [parinktys] username

title: Command: mkdir
text:
Command: mkdir
Category: user management

Description En:
Creates a home directory manually (alternative to useradd -m).

Description Lt:
Sukuria namų katalogą vartotojui (naudojama alternatyviai vietoj useradd -m).

Examples:
  1. mkdir /home/laura
  2. mkdir /home/anna

Notes En:
Must be followed by chown and chmod to set correct permissions.

Notes Lt:
Reikia vėliau priskirti teises su chown ir chmod.

Usage:
mkdir /home/username

title: Command: chown
text:
Command: chown
Category: user management

Description En:
Sets the owner of a file or directory.

Description Lt:
Nustato failo arba katalogo savininką.

Examples:
  1. chown laura:laura /home/laura

Usage:
chown user:group path

title: Command: ls -la /etc/skel
text:
Command: ls -la /etc/skel
Category: user management

Description En:
Displays default files copied to new users' home directories.

Description Lt:
Parodo numatytuosius failus, kurie kopijuojami į naujo vartotojo namų katalogą.

Examples:
  1. ls -la /etc/skel

Usage:
ls -la /etc/skel

title: Command: userdel -r
text:
Command: userdel -r
Category: user management

Description En:
Deletes a user and their home directory.

Description Lt:
Ištrina vartotoją ir jo namų katalogą.

Examples:
  1. userdel -r wim

Usage:
userdel -r username

title: Command: usermod -s
text:
Command: usermod -s
Category: user management

Description En:
Changes the user's login shell.

Description Lt:
Pakeičia vartotojo prisijungimo shell.

Examples:
  1. usermod -s /bin/bash laura
  2. usermod -s /bin/ksh annelies

Usage:
usermod -s /path/to/shell username

title: Command: chsh
text:
Command: chsh
Category: user management

Description En:
Allows a user to change their login shell.

Description Lt:
Leidžia vartotojui pasikeisti savo login shell.

Examples:
  1. chsh -s /bin/ksh
  2. chsh -s /bin/bash

Usage:
chsh -s /path/to/shell

title: Command: passwd
text:
Command: passwd
Category: user-management

Description En:
Changes a user's password.

Description Lt:
Keičia vartotojo slaptažodį.

Examples:
  1. passwd
  2. passwd tania

Notes En:
Root can change passwords without needing the old one.

Notes Lt:
Root vartotojas gali keisti slaptažodžius be seno slaptažodžio.

Usage:
passwd [username]

title: Command: cat /etc/shadow
text:
Command: cat /etc/shadow
Category: user-management

Description En:
Displays hashed password entries.

Description Lt:
Parodo užšifruotus slaptažodžių įrašus.

Examples:
  1. sudo cat /etc/shadow

Notes En:
File is readable only by root.

Notes Lt:
Failą gali skaityti tik root.

Usage:
cat /etc/shadow

title: Command: useradd -m username -p $(openssl passwd 'pass')
text:
Command: useradd -m username -p $(openssl passwd 'pass')
Category: user-management

Description En:
Creates a user with an encrypted password.

Description Lt:
Sukuria vartotoją su užšifruotu slaptažodžiu.

Examples:
  1. useradd -m -p $(openssl passwd xavier) xavier

Usage:
useradd -m -p <encrypted> username

title: Command: openssl passwd hunter2
text:
Command: openssl passwd hunter2
Category: crypto

Description En:
Generates a password hash.

Description Lt:
Sugeneruoja slaptažodžio hash.

Examples:
  1. openssl passwd hunter2
  2. openssl passwd -salt 42 hunter2

Notes En:
You can specify a salt parameter.

Notes Lt:
Galima nurodyti salt parametrą.

Usage:
openssl passwd <password>

title: Command: gcc MyCrypt.c -o MyCrypt -lcrypt
text:
Command: gcc MyCrypt.c -o MyCrypt -lcrypt
Category: development

Description En:
Compiles a C program using the crypt function.

Description Lt:
Sukompiliuoja C programą, kuri naudoja crypt funkciją.

Examples:
  1. ./MyCrypt hunter2 42
  2. ./MyCrypt hunter2 932

Usage:
gcc MyCrypt.c -o MyCrypt -lcrypt

title: Command: grep PASS /etc/login.defs
text:
Command: grep PASS /etc/login.defs
Category: user-management

Description En:
Displays password policy configuration.

Description Lt:
Parodo slaptažodžių politikos nustatymus.

Examples:
  1. grep PASS /etc/login.defs

Usage:
grep PASS /etc/login.defs

title: Command: chage
text:
Command: chage
Category: user-management

Description En:
Changes password aging settings.

Description Lt:
Keičia slaptažodžio galiojimo nustatymus.

Examples:
  1. chage -l paul
  2. chage -E 2025-01-01 paul

Usage:
chage [options] username

title: Command: usermod -L username
text:
Command: usermod -L username
Category: user-management

Description En:
Locks a user's password.

Description Lt:
Užrakina vartotojo slaptažodį.

Examples:
  1. usermod -L laura
  2. grep laura /etc/shadow | cut -c1-70

Notes En:
Adds ! at the beginning of the hash.

Notes Lt:
Prie užšifruoto slaptažodžio pridedamas ! simbolis.

Usage:
usermod -L username

title: Command: usermod -U username
text:
Command: usermod -U username
Category: user-management

Description En:
Unlocks a user's password.

Description Lt:
Atrakina vartotojo slaptažodį.

Examples:
  1. usermod -U laura

Usage:
usermod -U username

title: Command: vipw
text:
Command: vipw
Category: system

Description En:
Safely edits the /etc/passwd file.

Description Lt:
Saugiai redaguoja /etc/passwd failą.

Examples:
  1. vipw

Notes En:
Locks the file while editing.

Notes Lt:
Užrakina failą redagavimo metu.

Usage:
vipw

title: Command: vipw -s
text:
Command: vipw -s
Category: system

Description En:
Safely edits the /etc/shadow file.

Description Lt:
Saugiai redaguoja /etc/shadow.

Examples:
  1. vipw -s

Usage:
vipw -s

title: Command: groups
text:
Command: groups
Category: groups

Description En:
Shows which groups the user belongs to.

Description Lt:
Parodo, kokioms grupėms priklauso vartotojas.

Examples:
  1. groups
  2. groups harry

Usage:
groups [username]

title: Command: usermod
text:
Command: usermod
Category: groups

Description En:
Modifies a user's group membership – adds or removes from groups.

Description Lt:
Modifikuoja vartotojo grupes – prideda ar pašalina iš grupių.

Examples:
  1. usermod -a -G tennis inge
  2. usermod -a -G darts sandra
  3. usermod -a -G football annelies

Notes En:
Important: always use -a with -G to avoid removing existing groups.

Notes Lt:
Svarbu naudoti -a kartu su -G, kad neištrintų senų grupių.

Usage:
usermod -a -G <group> <user>

title: Command: groupmod
text:
Command: groupmod
Category: groups

Description En:
Changes a group's name or settings.

Description Lt:
Pakeičia grupės pavadinimą arba parametrus.

Examples:
  1. groupmod -n darts snooker
  2. groupmod -n pool tennis

Usage:
groupmod -n <new_name> <old_name>

title: Command: groupdel
text:
Command: groupdel
Category: groups

Description En:
Deletes a group from the system.

Description Lt:
Ištrina grupę iš sistemos.

Examples:
  1. groupdel tennis

Usage:
groupdel <group_name>

title: Command: gpasswd
text:
Command: gpasswd
Category: groups

Description En:
Manages group administrators and group members.

Description Lt:
Valdo grupių administratorius ir narius.

Examples:
  1. gpasswd -a serena sports
  2. gpasswd -a harry sports
  3. gpasswd -d serena sports
  4. gpasswd -A '' sports

Notes En:
Allows adding and removing members without root password.

Notes Lt:
Leidžia pridėti ir pašalinti narius be root slaptažodžio.

Usage:
gpasswd <options> <group>

title: Command: newgrp
text:
Command: newgrp
Category: groups

Description En:
Starts a subshell with the specified primary group.

Description Lt:
Sukuria naują subshell su nurodyta pagrindine grupe.

Examples:
  1. newgrp tennis
  2. newgrp admin

Usage:
newgrp <group>

title: Command: vigr
text:
Command: vigr
Category: groups

Description En:
Safe editor for /etc/group with locking.

Description Lt:
Saugi /etc/group redagavimo komanda su failo užrakinimu.

Examples:
  1. vigr

Notes En:
Administrator-only editor, works like vipw but for groups.

Notes Lt:
Naudoti tik administratoriui, veikia kaip vipw.

Usage:
vigr

title: Command: ls -l
text:
Command: ls -l
Category: file_ownership

Description En:
Lists files verbosely showing owner, group, and permissions.

Description Lt:
Išsamiai išvardija failus su savininku, grupe ir teisėmis.

Examples:
  1. ls -l
  2. ls -l /etc

Notes En:
Useful to quickly inspect permissions and ownership.

Notes Lt:
Naudinga greitai patikrinti teises ir savininką.

Usage:
ls -l [path]

title: Command: ls -lh
text:
Command: ls -lh
Category: file_ownership

Description En:
Shows detailed listing with human-readable sizes (KB/MB).

Description Lt:
Rodo detalią informaciją su žmogui patogiais dydžiais (KB/MB).

Examples:
  1. ls -lh
  2. ls -lh /var/log

Notes En:
The -h flag does not affect permissions/owner display.

Notes Lt:
Papildomas -h nekeičia rodomų teisių ar savininko.

Usage:
ls -lh [path]

title: Command: ls -ld /dev/console /dev/sda
text:
Command: ls -ld /dev/console /dev/sda
Category: special_files

Description En:
Displays metadata for the specified device nodes.

Description Lt:
Parodo nurodytų specialių įrenginių metaduomenis.

Examples:
  1. ls -ld /dev/console /dev/sda

Notes En:
Use to verify permissions and types of device files.

Notes Lt:
Naudojama tikrinti specialių failų teises ir tipus.

Usage:
ls -ld <paths>

title: Command: ls -ld /etc /etc/hosts /etc/motd
text:
Command: ls -ld /etc /etc/hosts /etc/motd
Category: special_files

Description En:
Shows permissions/ownership for directories and config entries.

Description Lt:
Rodo katalogų ir konfigūracijų įrašų teises/savininką.

Examples:
  1. ls -ld /etc /etc/hosts /etc/motd

Notes En:
Handy for quick inspection of system entries.

Notes Lt:
Naudinga greitam sisteminių failų patikrinimui.

Usage:
ls -ld <paths>

title: Command: cut -d: -f1 /etc/passwd | column
text:
Command: cut -d: -f1 /etc/passwd | column
Category: file_ownership

Description En:
Extracts usernames from /etc/passwd and formats them in columns.

Description Lt:
Išskiria /etc/passwd vartotojų vardus ir gražiai suformatuoja.

Examples:
  1. cut -d: -f1 /etc/passwd | column

Notes En:
Useful to view a clean list of usernames only.

Notes Lt:
Padeda peržiūrėti tik vardų sąrašą be papildomų laukų.

Usage:
cut -d: -f1 /etc/passwd | column

title: Command: ls -l proc2.bash
text:
Command: ls -l proc2.bash
Category: permissions_rwx

Description En:
Shows a specific file’s permissions, owner and group.

Description Lt:
Parodo konkretaus failo teises, savininką ir grupę.

Examples:
  1. ls -l proc2.bash

Notes En:
Quick inspection of a single file's permissions.

Notes Lt:
Greitas vieno failo teisių patikrinimas.

Usage:
ls -l <file>

title: Command: chgrp tennis file2
text:
Command: chgrp tennis file2
Category: permissions_chgrp

Description En:
Changes a file’s group to the specified one.

Description Lt:
Pakeičia failo grupę į nurodytą.

Examples:
  1. chgrp tennis file2

Notes En:
Requires privileges or ownership of the file.

Notes Lt:
Reikia atitinkamų teisių arba būti savininku.

Usage:
chgrp <group> <file>

title: Command: chgrp snooker file3
text:
Command: chgrp snooker file3
Category: permissions_chgrp

Description En:
Assigns another group to a file.

Description Lt:
Priskiria kitą grupę failui.

Examples:
  1. chgrp snooker file3

Notes En:
Target group must exist on the system.

Notes Lt:
Grupė turi egzistuoti sistemoje.

Usage:
chgrp <group> <file>

title: Command: chgrp foo file1
text:
Command: chgrp foo file1
Category: permissions_chgrp

Description En:
Sets the file’s group to “foo”.

Description Lt:
Keičia failo grupę į „foo“. 

Examples:
  1. chgrp foo file1

Notes En:
Used to adjust group ownership.

Notes Lt:
Naudojamas grupinės nuosavybės koregavimui.

Usage:
chgrp <group> <file>

title: Command: chown paul fileForPaul
text:
Command: chown paul fileForPaul
Category: permissions_chown

Description En:
Changes a file’s owner to the specified user.

Description Lt:
Pakeičia failo savininką į nurodytą vartotoją.

Examples:
  1. chown paul fileForPaul

Notes En:
Usually requires root privileges.

Notes Lt:
Dažniausiai reikia root teisių.

Usage:
chown <user> <file>

title: Command: chown root:paul fileForPaul
text:
Command: chown root:paul fileForPaul
Category: permissions_chown

Description En:
Changes both owner and group in one operation.

Description Lt:
Pakeičia savininką ir grupę vienu veiksmu.

Examples:
  1. chown root:paul fileForPaul

Notes En:
Convenient to set full ownership.

Notes Lt:
Patogu nustatyti pilną nuosavybę.

Usage:
chown <user>:<group> <file>

title: Command: chown paul:paul fileForPaul
text:
Command: chown paul:paul fileForPaul
Category: permissions_chown

Description En:
Sets both owner and group to the same user.

Description Lt:
Nustato tiek savininką, tiek grupę į tą patį vartotoją.

Examples:
  1. chown paul:paul fileForPaul

Notes En:
Common for home directory ownership.

Notes Lt:
Dažna praktika namų katalogams.

Usage:
chown <user>:<group> <file>

title: Command: chown root:project12 fileForPaul
text:
Command: chown root:project12 fileForPaul
Category: permissions_chown

Description En:
Adjusts owner and group for project workflows.

Description Lt:
Pakeičia savininką ir grupę pagal projekto reikmes.

Examples:
  1. chown root:project12 fileForPaul

Notes En:
Useful when a file belongs to a project group.

Notes Lt:
Naudinga kai failas priklauso projektinei grupei.

Usage:
chown <user>:<group> <file>

title: Command: chmod u+x permissions.txt
text:
Command: chmod u+x permissions.txt
Category: chmod_symbolic

Description En:
Adds execute permission for the owner.

Description Lt:
Prideda vykdymo teisę savininkui.

Examples:
  1. chmod u+x permissions.txt

Notes En:
Symbolic mode affects only the targeted class.

Notes Lt:
Simbolinė teisė keičia tik nurodytą subjektą.

Usage:
chmod u+x <file>

title: Command: chmod g-r permissions.txt
text:
Command: chmod g-r permissions.txt
Category: chmod_symbolic

Description En:
Removes read permission for the group.

Description Lt:
Pašalina skaitymo teisę grupei.

Examples:
  1. chmod g-r permissions.txt

Notes En:
Used to restrict group access.

Notes Lt:
Naudojama apriboti grupės prieigą.

Usage:
chmod g-r <file>

title: Command: chmod o-r permissions.txt
text:
Command: chmod o-r permissions.txt
Category: chmod_symbolic

Description En:
Removes read permission for others.

Description Lt:
Pašalina skaitymo teisę kitiems.

Examples:
  1. chmod o-r permissions.txt

Notes En:
Reduces public visibility of the file.

Notes Lt:
Mažina viešą failo prieinamumą.

Usage:
chmod o-r <file>

title: Command: chmod u+w permissions.txt
text:
Command: chmod u+w permissions.txt
Category: chmod_symbolic

Description En:
Grants write permission to the owner.

Description Lt:
Suteikia rašymo teisę savininkui.

Examples:
  1. chmod u+w permissions.txt

Notes En:
Allows owner to modify the file.

Notes Lt:
Leidžia savininkui keisti failo turinį.

Usage:
chmod u+w <file>

title: Command: chmod u-rw permissions.txt
text:
Command: chmod u-rw permissions.txt
Category: chmod_symbolic

Description En:
Removes read and write permissions for the owner.

Description Lt:
Pašalina skaitymo ir rašymo teises savininkui.

Examples:
  1. chmod u-rw permissions.txt

Notes En:
Commonly shown in examples; rarely used in practice.

Notes Lt:
Dažnai taikoma tik pavyzdžiams; praktikoje retai.

Usage:
chmod u-rw <file>

title: Command: chmod a+r permissions.txt
text:
Command: chmod a+r permissions.txt
Category: chmod_symbolic

Description En:
Grants read permission to all (u,g,o).

Description Lt:
Suteikia skaitymo teisę visiems (u,g,o).

Examples:
  1. chmod a+r permissions.txt

Notes En:
Makes the file readable by everyone.

Notes Lt:
Padidina prieinamumą visiems vartotojams.

Usage:
chmod a+r <file>

title: Command: chmod u=rw,g=r,o=
text:
Command: chmod u=rw,g=r,o=
Category: chmod_symbolic

Description En:
Sets exact mode: owner rw, group r, others none.

Description Lt:
Tiksliai nustato teises: savininkui rw, grupei r, kitiems – jokios.

Examples:
  1. chmod u=rw,g=r,o= permissions.txt

Notes En:
Assigns exact bits rather than add/remove.

Notes Lt:
Užrašo teises tiksliai, ne prideda/atimina.

Usage:
chmod u=rw,g=r,o= <file>

title: Command: chmod u+rwx,g+rw,o+r permissions.txt
text:
Command: chmod u+rwx,g+rw,o+r permissions.txt
Category: chmod_symbolic

Description En:
Adds multiple permissions for different classes at once.

Description Lt:
Prideda kelias teises skirtingoms klasėms vienu veiksmu.

Examples:
  1. chmod u+rwx,g+rw,o+r permissions.txt

Notes En:
Multiple segments can be combined in one command.

Notes Lt:
Galima kombinuoti keletą segmentų su kableliais.

Usage:
chmod u+rwx,g+rw,o+r <file>

title: Command: chmod u+rw,g-wx,o-r permissions.txt
text:
Command: chmod u+rw,g-wx,o-r permissions.txt
Category: chmod_symbolic

Description En:
Adds and removes permissions for different classes in one go.

Description Lt:
Vienu metu suteikia ir atima teises skirtingoms klasėms.

Examples:
  1. chmod u+rw,g-wx,o-r permissions.txt

Notes En:
Convenient for one-shot permission adjustments.

Notes Lt:
Patogu koreguoti teises vienu veiksmu.

Usage:
chmod u+rw,g-wx,o-r <file>

title: Command: chmod 777 permissions.txt
text:
Command: chmod 777 permissions.txt
Category: chmod_octal

Description En:
Grants full permissions to everyone (rwxrwxrwx).

Description Lt:
Suteikia pilnas teises visiems (rwxrwxrwx).

Examples:
  1. chmod 777 permissions.txt

Notes En:
Avoid for sensitive files due to security risks.

Notes Lt:
Nenaudoti jautriems failams dėl saugumo.

Usage:
chmod 777 <file>

title: Command: chmod 654 permissions.txt
text:
Command: chmod 654 permissions.txt
Category: chmod_octal

Description En:
Sets mode: owner rw-, group r-x, others r--.

Description Lt:
Nustato teises: savininkui rw-, grupei r-x, kitiems r--.

Examples:
  1. chmod 654 permissions.txt

Notes En:
Octal form sets all bits quickly.

Notes Lt:
Oktalinė forma greitai apibrėžia visus bitus.

Usage:
chmod 654 <file>

title: Command: chmod 751 permissions.txt
text:
Command: chmod 751 permissions.txt
Category: chmod_octal

Description En:
Sets mode: owner rwx, group r-x, others --x.

Description Lt:
Nustato teises: savininkui rwx, grupei r-x, kitiems --x.

Examples:
  1. chmod 751 permissions.txt

Notes En:
Good for executables with limited read access.

Notes Lt:
Tinka vykdomiems failams su ribotu skaitymu.

Usage:
chmod 751 <file>

title: Command: chmod 789 permissions.txt
text:
Command: chmod 789 permissions.txt
Category: chmod_octal

Description En:
Attempts to set an invalid mode (9 is not a valid bit).

Description Lt:
Bando nustatyti neteisingas teises (9 nėra galiojantis bitas).

Examples:
  1. chmod 789 permissions.txt

Notes En:
Only digits 0–7 are valid in octal modes.

Notes Lt:
Oktalinėse teisėse galimi tik 0–7.

Usage:
chmod 789 <file>

title: Command: umask
text:
Command: umask
Category: permissions_umask

Description En:
Displays the current umask value, defining which permissions are removed from newly created files and directories.

Description Lt:
Parodo dabartinę umask reikšmę, kuri nurodo, kokios teisės bus pašalintos naujiems failams ir katalogams.

Examples:
  1. umask
  2. umask 022
  3. umask 077

Notes En:
Umask is not permissions; it subtracts bits from default permissions.

Notes Lt:
Umask nėra teisės — tai bitai, kurie atimami iš numatytų teisių.

Usage:
umask

title: Command: mkdir -m 700 mydir
text:
Command: mkdir -m 700 mydir
Category: permissions_mkdir

Description En:
Creates a directory with explicitly defined permissions.

Description Lt:
Sukuria katalogą su nurodytomis teisėmis.

Examples:
  1. mkdir -m 700 mydir
  2. mkdir -m 755 public

Notes En:
No need for chmod if permissions are set during creation via -m.

Notes Lt:
chmod nereikia, jei teises nurodomos iškart su -m.

Usage:
mkdir -m <mode> <directory>

title: Command: cp -p file1 file2
text:
Command: cp -p file1 file2
Category: permissions_copy

Description En:
Copies a file while preserving permissions, owner, and timestamps.

Description Lt:
Kopijuoja failą ir išsaugo teises, savininką ir laiko žymes.

Examples:
  1. cp -p file1 file2
  2. cp -p myfile.txt backup/myfile.txt

Notes En:
Essential when copying system or configuration files.

Notes Lt:
Labai svarbu kopijuojant konfigūracijų ar sisteminius failus.

Usage:
cp -p <source> <destination>
